Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Antineoplastic Agent/Alkylating Agent/Antineoplastic Alkylating Agent/Ethylenimine Compound/Trimelamol
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A synthetic derivative of trimethylmelamine with antineoplastic properties. An analogue of siderophores (microbial iron chelators), trimelamol induces the formation of a reactive iminium species which may crosslink DNA. (NCI04)
